name: grsecurity.vim
description:
This is a syntax definition for the grsecurity policy (/etc/grsec/policy). Basic syntax highlighting of the policy file and folding works at the moment.

Screenshot: http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/Le_YL0dQt59AlPluaVUwNw

Mercurial Repository: http://www.bitbucket.org/lobo/grsecurityvim/
You can get the development version via mercurial: hg clone https://lobo@bitbucket.org/lobo/grsecurityvim/

Policy language documentation: http://www.grsecurity.net/~spender/newDoc.pdf
install_details:
Place grsecurity.vim file in ~/.vim/syntax/ folder.

set filetype=grsecurity
